actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to increase an authorization of appropriations in order to complete the Mission 66 bypass road at Vicksburg, Miss.

summary.text: Increases the authorization of appropriations from $2,050,000 to $3,550,000 in order to complete the Mission 66 Bypass Road at Vicksburg, Mississippi.

titles.title: A bill to increase an authorization of appropriations in order to complete the Mission 66 bypass road at Vicksburg, Miss.
